name.ja: <ruby>冥<rt>めい</rt></ruby><ruby>跡<rt>せき</rt></ruby><ruby>祭<rt>さい</rt></ruby>－イシリアの<ruby>降<rt>こう</rt></ruby><ruby>霊<rt>れい</rt></ruby>－

requirement.en: Send 1 "Offering to Isyria", 1 "Sarcophagus of Isyria", and 1 "Spirit of Isyria" from your hand and/or face-down on your field to the Graveyard.

effect.en: Ritual Summon "Isyria, Deity of the Monumenthes" by sending face-up "Yorishiro of Isyria" from your field to the Graveyard whose total Levels equal 4 or more as material (you cannot use more monsters than necessary as material).
